body.name: G Gradual Men's Sweatpants with Zipper Pockets Athletic Pants Traning Track Pants Joggers for Men Soccer, Running, Workout
features: The pants are made of 87% polyester and 13% spandex. Smooth and stretchy material keep comfortable wear experience.
Elastic waistband and adjustable inner drawstring offer different people's custom fit.
Side deep pockets and back pocket are all designed with zipper to ensure put phone, cards safe when moving.
Tapered trouser legs and stretchy ankle cuffs keep length suitable for doing exercise.
These men's pants are perfect for gym, soccer, running, jogging, workout, athletic, track, traning and others sports.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Each of our products are born in practice, we never stop our process in discovery and trying,just for the better fabric, design, color and stitching.All this we have done is to give you a better feeling of comfort and aesthetic, we will never stop innovating for creating better experience for you.

STRETCHY & SOFT MATERIAL G Gradual men's sweatpants are made of comfortable, soft and 4-way stretch fabric, enhances the stretchability of sweatpants and increases the range of motion. You can use them as athletic wear or daily wear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars G Gradual Men's Sweatpants - The Ultimate Fusion of Comfort and Versatility!
reviews.reviewText: G Gradual Men's Sweatpants have effortlessly secured their spot as my go-to choice for both intense workout sessions and those laid-back work-from-home days. These athletic pants offer a perfect blend of comfort, functionality, and style, making them an absolute wardrobe essential. Here's why they've earned a glowing 5-star review:Supreme Comfort: ☁️The comfort level of G Gradual Sweatpants is unparalleled. The fabric is soft against the skin, providing a cozy and snug fit that feels like a warm hug. Whether I'm powering through a workout or settling into my home office, the comfort these pants offer is unmatched.Versatile Design: 🔄The versatile design seamlessly transitions from the gym to the home office with ease. The modern and athletic look ensures that I can wear them for a quick jog, an intense workout, or pair them with a casual tee for a comfortable work-from-home ensemble. The versatility of these sweatpants makes them a wardrobe staple.Zipper Pockets for Functionality: 🤐The inclusion of zipper pockets is a game-changer. Not only do they add a stylish edge to the design, but they also provide secure storage for essentials like keys, phone, or wallet. The functionality of the zipper pockets enhances the practicality of these sweatpants, eliminating the need for an extra bag during workouts.Perfect Fit and Adjustability: 📏The fit of these sweatpants is spot-on. The elastic waistband with an adjustable drawstring ensures a customized fit that stays in place during any activity. Whether I'm lunging, stretching, or just lounging, the pants move with me, providing a comfortable and secure fit.Breathability for Intense Workouts: 🏋️Despite being cozy and warm, these sweatpants are surprisingly breathable. The fabric allows for proper ventilation during intense workouts, preventing overheating and discomfort. The breathability factor adds to the overall functionality of the pants, making them suitable for various fitness activities.Durable and High-Quality Construction: 🛠️The durability of G Gradual Sweatpants is evident in their high-quality construction. The reinforced seams and sturdy fabric ensure that they withstand the rigors of regular use. Whether I'm pushing my limits in the gym or settling into a long workday, these sweatpants hold up exceptionally well.Easy Care and Maintenance: 🧺The easy care and maintenance of these sweatpants are a practical bonus. They are machine washable and maintain their shape and color even after multiple washes. The hassle-free upkeep adds to the convenience of incorporating them into my daily routine.Stylish Enough for Everyday Wear: 👔Beyond their functionality, these sweatpants boast a stylish design that makes them suitable for everyday wear. The modern cut and thoughtful details elevate them from basic workout gear to versatile athleisure attire that seamlessly fits into my daily wardrobe rotation.Affordable Luxury: 💰Considering the comfort, functionality, and style offered by G Gradual Sweatpants, their affordability is a pleasant surprise. They deliver a level of luxury typically associated with higher-priced athletic wear, making them a budget-friendly choice without compromising on quality.Boosts Productivity While Working from Home: 💼Working from home can sometimes blur the lines between relaxation and productivity. Wearing G Gradual Sweatpants adds a touch of professionalism to my remote work attire while ensuring that I remain comfortable and focused throughout the day. The boost in productivity is an unexpected yet welcomed benefit.Conclusion: 🌟In conclusion, G Gradual Men's Sweatpants have earned their place as my favorite companion for workouts and work-from-home days. With supreme comfort, versatile design, zipper pockets for functionality, perfect fit, breathability, durability, easy care, everyday style, affordability, and a productivity boost, these sweatpants are a 5-star winner in every aspect. If you're on the hunt for the perfect blend of comfort and functionality, look no further than G Gradual Sweatpants. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m 5’10” and 190lbs, pretty fit. Large fits perfectly. I love the material. It’s the perfect thickness for mild weather, 40-70. I use them for the gym, walking the dog, grocery store, etc. They’re very versatile. I love the zippers. These are at least as good of quality as my Under Armor and North Face joggers that cost over $100/each. My only hesitation is the logo. I personally think it cheapens the pants. It doesn’t look bad, just cheap. Just my honest opinion. I think I would rather it didn’t have the logo. I really like them. They are extremely comfortable, and I plan on ordering another pair in a different color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for traveling!
reviews.reviewText: I have these in black and khaki. I love the black pants and they fit very well. Not too baggy but also not too skinny. They feel soft and I like that they have zippers on the pockets. The khaki ones are great too but I think the color is just a little off. A little too orange for my taste.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit and quality
reviews.reviewText: Great quality that should last several years. Perfect for working out and running or casual wear. Not made for warmth but very flexible and breathable, very comfy. Perfect fit, sizing is accurate

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and great price
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical at first always buying name brand sweats etc. however these sweatpants are A+ quality, comfortable and true to size

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light weight, work out pants!
reviews.reviewText: Light weight work out pants and would recommend to all. These are comfortable, very light weight, and fit true to size. For the price I would say YES!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Workout Pants
reviews.reviewText: Like the softness, comfort and stretchy feature of the Polyester and spandex type materials while on the go as leisure and/or workout wear. Stylish pants that are durable and easily wash and wear. Hope Santa brings me several more pairs of this item in different colors as they are a great value activewear for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too much business shows
reviews.reviewText: I ordered 2 sizes so that 1 would fit. Neither looked good as there was way too much of my husband's business showing. Both pairs will be returned. Also, they were narrow in the calves
Se los compré a mi papá y le gustaron. Son de muy buen material y resistente, nada calurosos y quedan muy bien.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great comfortable lightweight fit, like the fact that it has back zipped pocket, plenty of colours to choose from, great value for money
It feels premium and is very stretchable. Perfect for gym and regular jogging.

Lo compre pq quería estar cómodo mientras estudiaba y la verdad es bastante cómodo, consideren que es algo largo pero no demasiado, y la segunda es que me llegó con un hoyo en la bolsa derecha lo cual sí me decepcionó bastante pero lo demás todo bien.
